identity.name: DocAgent
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Grid precision with Cyberpunk glow.
Content is King: Code and Documentation are the heroes.
Zoom In: Focus on the details of the code and the clarity of the docs.
Negative Space: Give the code room to breathe.

code.usage: Code Blocks, API Keys, Technical Data

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(59,130,246,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium border border-white/10

cards.default: bg-card border border-white/5 rounded-xl shadow-2xl hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.default: bg-input border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-lg h-12 px-4 text-foreground placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode Only: The app is strictly dark mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle.
No Gradients on Text: Keep text solid for readability.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl for sticky headers and overlays.
Borders: Use 1px borders with 5-10% opacity (white/10) for subtle separation.
Shadows: Use colored shadows (primary color) for active states to create a 'glow' effect.
Data-Testid: All interactive elements must have a data-testid attribute.
Spacing: Use generous padding (py-24, py-32) for marketing sections.
Contrast: Ensure text is legible against dark backgrounds (use text-gray-300 for body, white for headings).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react', 'framer-motion', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge'. 2. Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the colors provided in this JSON. 3. Create a 'layout.tsx' that enforces the dark theme background. 4. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and dashboard placeholders. 5. Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard overview.
